amendment.description: To provide for appropriations for the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program.

action.text: Amendment SA 2194 proposed by Senator Reed.
Point of order that an emergency designation within the amendment violates the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2194.

Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2194 [the section within the amendment regarding an emergency designation] rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 43. Record Vote Number: 270.
The emergency designation within amendment SA 2194 was stricken.
Point of order that the amendment violates the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2194.
Amendment SA 2194 ruled out of order by the chair.
